result.execSummary:
The defendant Charles Arthur Joseph was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: *Pay all applicable court costs and fees by 11/14/16 or to be docketed as a civil judgment. Court ordered DNA sample after today's proceedings.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence. Huber for work and medical treatment Only. Report date: 11/20/15 by 5:00 pm.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles Arthur Joseph

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

AS TO COUNT 1:

The Court ordered defendant to serve 45 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 2 (two) days time served.  The Court granted Huber privileges, pursuant to 303.08 Wis. Stats. for work and medical treatment ONLY: Report date: November 20, 2015 by 5:00 p.m. 

Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees by November 14, 2016, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.

Court ordered DNA sample after today's proceedings.

Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Sentencing Referral Form.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible. 

AS TO COUNT 2:

Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered count dismissed and read-in to case for the purposes of sentencing.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Court is in jury trial again for today's proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.  State to review file for offer.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel is still awaiting discs from the state.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status conference held off the record. Defense counsel needs additional time to review with his client.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.    Defense counsel has received discovery and offer, state is obtaining additional discovery. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Charles Arthur Joseph in custody.  
Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Charles Arthur Joseph
Current: 3823 N 16th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States  (Effective: 05-24-2015)
Prior: 3849 N 17th St, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
